description: This file defines a singleton class `DatabaseHelper` that manages local SQLite database access for a notes application. It handles database initialization, creation of tables for notes and tags, and creation of indexes.

classes.name: DatabaseHelper
classes.description: Singleton class providing access to the local SQLite database, including schema creation and potential migrations.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that returns the database instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _initDb
methods.description: Initializes the database by creating the schema with notes and tags tables, and indexes.
